name: Chaos at the Kitchen
description:
Defeat waves of malicious ingredients to save your restaurant.

An Italian Chef is preparing for the working day at his restaurant but when he gets to the kitchen to start baking those pizzas suddenly the ingredients come to life and start going after the Chef. 

Now you, as the Chef, have to fight those malicious ingredients and deliver the meals your customers are waiting for.

This is a vertical slice of the game, so it's not 100% completed.

Controls
  • Left Click - Normal Attack
  • Right Click -  Special Attack   
  • Arrows or W/A/S/D to move
Features
  • Fast-paced combat
  • Selectable upgrades
  • Score system
